author: insider@insider.com (Allison Nichol Longtin)
description: To achieve her rural dreams, Allison Nichol Longtin is investing in her home to increase its resale value — and finally learning to drive.
title: I want to buy land and move to the country in the next 5 years, and 4 steps I'm taking now will get me there
